price: Jika demikian, tentu akan Kami rasakan kepadamu (siksaan) berlipat ganda di dunia ini dan berlipat ganda setelah mati, dan engkau (Muhammad) tidak akan mendapat seorang penolong pun terhadap Kami.
arabic: إِذٗا لَّأَذَقۡنَٰكَ ضِعۡفَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ وَضِعۡفَ ٱلۡمَمَاتِ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ عَلَيۡنَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: idhan la-adhaqnāka ḍiʿ'fa al-ḥayati waḍiʿ'fa al-mamāti thumma lā tajidu laka ʿalaynā naṣīran
